coreAttributes.name: Glade Springs
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle of sparkling water bearing the brand name 'Glade Springs'. On the reverse label, a muscular stag-boy is pictured post-coitus with two deer-girls, and is drinking a bottle of this sparkling water.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first unscrewing the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the glass bottle of Glade Springs up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A faint sweet smell informs [npc.herHim] that this isn't any ordinary water, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the fizzy liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(taste)] a subtle hint of mint.
